title: Sri Lanka Core Consumer Prices
description: Core Consumer Prices in Sri Lanka decreased to 243.80 points in October from 244.70 points in September of 2022. Core Consumer Prices in Sri Lanka averaged 101.02 points from 2003 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 244.70 points in September of 2022 and a record low of 47.70 points in January of 2003. This page provides - Sri Lanka Core Consumer Prices- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bank of Sri Lanka
